name: Bawte
tag_list: social, media, buy, brands, consumers, retailers
overview:
Bawte connects customers to the brands they love through the products they buy. Bawte offers consumers extreme utility through automated product registration, instant access to warranty info, product manuals, how-to video, and customer service for only those products they own. Bawte also allows customers to easily share their purchases with their friends and followers.

For brands, they can finally understand their customers. They understand who is buy what and how often. By allowing them to easily share their purchases with their social community, it enhances the brand’s equity amongst their customer base and leverages the consumer’s social community to drive additional brand recognition through exposure.
